name: Note Ninja
description:
Using a MIDI keyboard or the computer keyboard, learn to play piano notes, chords, and progressions as a ninja jumping through color-changing portals!

FEATURES

3 Difficulties

  • Single notes (for beginners)
  • Triads (three notes at a time)
  • Seventh chords (four notes at a time)

5 Styles

  • Pop
  • Jazz
  • Neo-soul
  • And more!

2 Control Methods

  • MIDI keyboard compatible
  • Computer keyboard input

Play in any key!

With an on-screen keyboard guide for beginners!

Created by Bradley Immel and Kellen Vu for Stanford's MUSIC 257: Neuroplasticity and Musical Gaming course.
